participant_1.background:
I'm a radio DJ with a sweet tooth.
I love to sing in my free time, it's my passion and I dream of making it big one day.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
i cook well.
i am in my last year of grad school.

participant_2.background:
I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.
i love money.
i work 2 jobs.
I used to wear my brother's hand-me-downs when I was younger.
my husband is 20 years older than me.

content.text: Hello there!
Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a radio DJ and I love to sing in my free time. It's my passion and I dream of making it big one day. What do you do for fun?
I work 2 jobs, one as a dog walker and the other as a cashier. I love money and I'm always looking for ways to make more.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I used to work as a dog walker when I was in college. It was a lot of fun and I got to meet a lot of great dogs.
It is a lot of fun! I love getting to know my clients and their dogs. I'm also really good at it.
That's great! I'm sure your clients appreciate it.
They do! They always tell me how great I am with their dogs.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a job that you love.
Thank you! I am too. It's really important to me to enjoy my work.
Me too! I love being a radio DJ. It's so much fun to get to play music and talk to people all day long.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm glad you enjoy it so much.
Thanks! I do!
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Yes, I'm going to be singing in the choir at church on Sunday. I love singing and it's a great way to relax and clear my head.
That's awesome! I love singing too. I used to sing in the choir when I was younger.
Really? That's great! I'm sure you were really good.
Thank you! I loved it and I miss it.
You should join the choir at your church!
I might! I'll have to think about it.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to meet new people.
I'll definitely consider it!
Great! I hope you have a great day!
You too
